price: 18. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Dhowra (xilkuu idin saaray) Alle, naf walbana ha eegto waxay u hormarsatay berritoole (Qiyaamaha), kana dhowrsada xumaha. Hubaal Alle waa u xog ogaal waxaad fashaan.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waltanẓur nafsun mā qaddamat lighadin wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
